text:
You are not the V, I knew and loved as a great mom for 30 years. Something happened. If you have the occasion to hear me out, I have a very sound
physiological explanation of events from last year. But the nature of your situation is you will never investigate personal shortcomings.
Either way- when you reload for the next drive-by, you can at least see what you signed.
I honestly do wish you well. It's tough talking to the person who took my soulmate away.
Message 3335 of 4024
These messages are not appropriate. I ask you stop.
Sent:06/22/2024 at 07:18 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/22/2024 at 07:19 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Pick Up
Message 3336 of 4024
Which part?
That you were a great mom at one time?
We do not have a signed parenting plan?
You answear and then log off for 12 hours?
This is not a dig, I’m sincerely asking you.
Sent:06/22/2024 at 07:25 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/22/2024 at 09:05 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Pick Up
Message 3337 of 4024
Please see Andy’s rules. If you want to use him please consider using the guidelines he provides
Sent:06/22/2024 at 09:06 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/22/2024 at 09:06 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Pick Up
Message 3338 of 4024
I’d love to use him. How do we want to proceed?
Obviously he has to be involved for us to use him. It’s not just following email rules and pretending we have a therapist. We could have done that for
Dr Brown, Andy, the OFW suggested best practices, etc... for months now. We need the accountability.
Let’s game plan on engaging and I’m all in. Want to take the lead?
Sent:06/22/2024 at 09:12 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/22/2024 at 09:55 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Pick Up
